intro: Anthospermum randii, commonly known as the red-flowered anthospermum, is a species of flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to deep red. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a rough texture. Anthospermum randii is often found in moist, shaded environments within its native habitat.
